description: Tom Hanks’ son @chethanx says he’s going to throw the people talking shit on the internet into FEMA camps. 😂 God knows EXACTLY what your SICK & EVIL father has done. And soon the whole world will as well. Your weak attempt at reverse psychology isn’t fooling anybody. And the panic in your soulless eyes brings joy to those who love The Lord. Repent before it’s too late. #PainIsComing #GodWins #WWG1WGA #DarkToLight #PatriotsAreInControl #WeAreTheNewsNow
